coreAttributes.name: bridle
coreAttributes.description: A piece of equipment that's designed to fit around the head of a horse and used to direct the animal. Thanks to an arcane enchantment, the leather straps and headstall resize themselves to fit any muzzle-faced person or beast.

sticker.descriptionModification: This particular bridle is fitted with reins.
The reins have been removed from this bridle.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] [npc.her] mouth wide and [npc.verb(slide)] the bridle's bit into it, before reaching back and fastening the buckles to keep the headstall in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the bridle's bit into [npc2.namePos] mouth, before reaching back and fastening the buckles to keep the headstall in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the bridle's bit into [npc2.namePos] mouth, before reaching back and tightly fastening the buckles to keep the headstall in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the bridle's straps and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the bridle's straps and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(unfasten)] the bridle's straps and [npc.verb(yank)] it off.
